CustomField.description: Holds the final Sales Tax to be copied to the associated opportunity. (If its Primary)
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Shipping_Address_NEW__c), 99999.99, IF( Sales_Tax_Historical__c != 0, Sales_Tax_Historical__c, Total_Sales_Tax__c+S_H_Tax__c ) )
CustomField.label: Sales Tax
